com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication

Class FirebaseLocationSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.mapnector.FirebaseCommunication.FirebaseLocationSystem

  • public class FirebaseLocationSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Communicates with firebase in all things that are associated with locations of users(retrieve others locations, update mine); One of the 3 FirebaseCommunication classes - manages work that has to do with the location system

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FirebaseLocationSystem.DoubleDoubleName
      small struct(class) that holds data we want to store about some user for future use; the data is the latitude,longitude, groupUser's name and color; explanation why color is float view in color variable docs of the struct

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private AdapterManager ADmanager
      ref to ADmanager created in LVhelper
      private java.util.ArrayList<Group> groupsAccessMyLocation
      list of groups that i allowed to them to access my location

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FirebaseLocationSystem(AdapterManager ADmanager)
      really nothing special, 2 rows that initialize the 2 variables

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canGroupAccessMineLocation()
      true if current group(ADmanager.lastSelectedGroup) can access my location, false otherwise
      void DB_changeMineLocation()
      set new latitude and longitude values in my location in firebase; values taken from public static variables of MapManager.class
      void DB_clearAllGroupsWithMineLocationAccess()
      iterate through 'groupsAccessMyLocation' and put false in 'allowAccessLoc' in firebase; none can view my location after this function
      void DB_groupMineLocationAccess(boolean allowAccess)
      sets data about allowing/not allowing accessing my location to current group(ADmanager.lastSelectedGroup) dependent on parameter
      void DB_updateUsersLocations(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,FirebaseLocationSystem.DoubleDoubleName> map)
      we pass the HashMap from 'MapManager.class' and fill it there; we retrieve new users locations (that allow us access it) and create objects of DoublDobuleName to store and show info later; if we don't have color for marker of that user generate random color(call getRandomMarkerColor)
      float getRandomMarkerColor()
      to make everything look better i decided to give every groupUser we can see in google map his own marker color; that's the job of this is function; again, why float view DoublDoubleName.color description

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • FirebaseLocationSystem

        public FirebaseLocationSystem(AdapterManager ADmanager)
        really nothing special, 2 rows that initialize the 2 variables
        Parameters:
        ADmanager - reference to ADmanager created in LVHelper

    • Method Detail

      • getRandomMarkerColor

        public float getRandomMarkerColor()
        to make everything look better i decided to give every groupUser we can see in google map his own marker color; that's the job of this is function; again, why float view DoublDoubleName.color description
        Returns:
        float that indicates google map marker color(BitmapDescriptorFactory.something)

      • DB_updateUsersLocations

        public void DB_updateUsersLocations(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,FirebaseLocationSystem.DoubleDoubleName> map)
        we pass the HashMap from 'MapManager.class' and fill it there; we retrieve new users locations (that allow us access it) and create objects of DoublDobuleName to store and show info later; if we don't have color for marker of that user generate random color(call getRandomMarkerColor)
        Parameters:
        map - the hashMap to store the data for later use

      • DB_groupMineLocationAccess

        public void DB_groupMineLocationAccess(boolean allowAccess)
        sets data about allowing/not allowing accessing my location to current group(ADmanager.lastSelectedGroup) dependent on parameter
        Parameters:
        allowAccess - true if we want to allow this group access my location, false otherwise

      • DB_clearAllGroupsWithMineLocationAccess

        public void DB_clearAllGroupsWithMineLocationAccess()
        iterate through 'groupsAccessMyLocation' and put false in 'allowAccessLoc' in firebase; none can view my location after this function

      • DB_changeMineLocation

        public void DB_changeMineLocation()
        set new latitude and longitude values in my location in firebase; values taken from public static variables of MapManager.class

      • canGroupAccessMineLocation

        public boolean canGroupAccessMineLocation()
        true if current group(ADmanager.lastSelectedGroup) can access my location, false otherwise
        Returns:
        true if current group(ADmanager.lastSelectedGroup) can access my location, false otherwise
